summary: NOV 30, 2015: WHILE TRAVELING ON INTERSTATE I-64, NORFOLK, VA. DURING A HEAVY RAIN STORM, BOTH WIPER BLADES STOPPED IN THE VERTICAL POSITION. I TRIED TO TURN THE WIPERS OFF AND ATTEMPTED VARIOUS OTHER SETTING BUT THE WIPERS REMAINED STATIONARY IN THE VERTICAL POSITION. DEC. 2, 2015, DEALER REPLACED THE WIPER MOTOR TO RESOLVE THE ISSUE.
